(6581)

Savannas face showed that she understood what he was telling them, 
but the fact that her eyes kept looking toward his hands showed 
distrust, he didn't expect a red carpet greeting but he didn't expect 
a four bot conference either. The Predicon expected a twenty one gun 
salute, all aimed at him. These Maximals seemed almost civilized, 
something the Predicons lacked. this attitude made things much easier 
for him.

(6642)

He glanced towards Kluster, the commander didn't seem interested in 
his tale but he was still willing to listen.

"I am going to open this scan cube and show you." Slowly he lowers 
the cube to the table pressing a button upon contact.

A bright light emmitted from the cube producing a geographical view 
of the Earth as it appeared upon Phobias arrival. "This is the planet 
we're on now. It will one day be called Earth by it's inhabitants the 
planet where the Ark crashed." Every bot on cybertron knew the story 
of the Autobots alliance with Earth so he didn't need to elaborate on 
the subject.

"These are scans I've taken fom orbit." The image flattens with 
bright red and orange waves surrounding the areas the Cybertronians 
have battled. and one big white wave origionating from the ocean.

"These temporal waves are becoming more frequent, and more 
disasterous." the spiders voice became louder and more urgent when a 
sudden distraction occurs.

"Kluster are you in here?" a new arrival entered the room. (Hot Rod.)

The new arrival had a young face, that seemed somehow more 
experienced than the rest of the Maximals. It appeared to be more of 
a classic design than he'd seen. "Is he for real or is he the result 
of one of the anomalies?" Phobia thought as Kluster excused himself. 
He was tempted to send one of his babies out to observe, but decided 
against it. He'd worked hard to get this far, he didn't want to ruin 
his chances with a stupid mistake.

Kluster returned shortly later and the presentation began once 
more. "As I was saying, these temporal waves are changing history as 
we know it. This wave especially worries me. (Points to white line) 
My scans showed thatthere was once a mountain on this Island, then 
suddenly it vanished causing a wave that nearly knocked me out of 
orbit.

"I hope you're ready for this, I'll be taken offline for sure for 
showing you this." Phobia took a moment to gather himself before 
continueing, "This is the cause of the temporal wave." The image of 
Earth fades to be replaced with a rotating image of a Predicon 
warship. "The Iron Fist could have only been sent here for one 
reason" Phobia still couldn't believe that the TriPredicus Council 
would do something that drastic,"The Council must have issued an 
order to destroy this planet."

A moment of silence, oohs and ahs around the room,

"And you realise that if A skyspy is launched and doesn't find any 
compatible life forms the Autobots and Decepticons will never awaken, 
the Earth will never assist the Autobots, The Matrix will never 
return to cybertron, Unicron wouldve succeeded in destroying our 
world and we will never have existed." He didn't want to give out to 
much information but he needed to use the information his babies 
stole from Magmatrons computer.

"Thats not the end of it either. If we're never created then we can't 
return to harm this planet. All the damage we're causing to this 
planet won't just alter the future, it'll cause an unrepairable loop 
which could expand and effect Primus only knows how many planets, 
colonies, even entire generations of life on other planets we'd 
destroy by messing with the space time continuum.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Kluster::
> 
> Prowl enters the equipment room, looking around. This place was 
overflowing! 
> He walks to a shelf, taking some of the equipment.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster walks back into the conference room.
> 
> "I apologize for the interruption," he says to Phobia, taking a 
seat again, 
> "You were about to say what this info of yours was?"
